Yeah we should make one together I loved your Unending Time cinematic track as well.

item.title: We Fight As One ‚Äî Andrew Adams [Cinematic]
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
Super duper trailer like. Finally seeing a whole new array of genres coming out from auxy, and whole heartedly appreciate your addition to the variety.

All you‚Äôre missing is some horns and you‚Äôll be Hans Zimmering it up.

How long did this take you?

Read full topic
item.source: We Fight As One ‚Äî Andrew Adams [Cinematic]

item.title: We Fight As One ‚Äî Andrew Adams [Cinematic]
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Woah woah woah yes yes yes

First off - amazing work. If performed by a live orchestra, this sounds like it could definitely come straight out of the Detroit: Become Human soundtrack. The really high violin definitely could sound better, but there‚Äôs nothing we can do about it. It‚Äôs purely how it sounds in Auxy. If you‚Äôd ever want to do a collaboration track in this orchestral style, I‚Äôd definitely love to try and work with you after hearing this masterpiece. I‚Äôve been really wanting to get into this kind of stuff but don‚Äôt know where to start.

I also really appreciate the title, since it‚Äôs pretty much the origin of my name.

Great work.

Read full topic
